languages.text: "Я многое слышала о... широких взглядах представителей династии фон Валанциус. И самой Леди Теодоры".
"I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."
languages.original_text: "Я многое слышала о... широких взглядах представителей династии фон Валанциус. И самой Леди Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."
"I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."
"I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."
"I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

languages.text: “我听说过很多传闻，他们说……冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的成员都非常开明，尤其是西奥多拉夫人。”
languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

traits.locale_text: “我听说过很多传闻，他们说……冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的成员都非常开明，尤其是西奥多拉夫人。”

languages.text: «He oído mucho sobre la... apertura de miras de la dinastía von Valancius. Especialmente la de lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

traits.locale_text: «He oído mucho sobre la... apertura de miras de la dinastía von Valancius. Especialmente la de lady Theodora».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が、いかに開放的かっていう噂はよーく聞いてるよ。特に、レディ・シオドーラはそうだった、ってね」
languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が、いかに開放的かっていう噂はよーく聞いてるよ。特に、レディ・シオドーラはそうだった、ってね」

languages.text: « J'ai souvent entendu dire que la dynastie von Valancius était plutôt... ouverte d'esprit. Tout particulièrement dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai souvent entendu dire que la dynastie von Valancius était plutôt... ouverte d'esprit. Tout particulièrement dame Théodora. »

languages.text: "Ich habe viel darüber gehört, wie ... tolerant die Mitglieder der Dynastie derer von Valancius sind. Insbesondere Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe viel darüber gehört, wie ... tolerant die Mitglieder der Dynastie derer von Valancius sind. Insbesondere Lady Theodora."

languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

languages.text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığı mensuplarının nasıl da... Açık fikirli olduğunu çokça duymuştum. özellikle de Leydi Theodora'nın."
languages.original_text: "I have heard a great deal about how... open-minded the members of the von Valancius dynasty are. And Lady Theodora especially."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius hanedanlığının üyelerinin nasıl da açık fikirli olduğunu çok duymuştum. Özellikle de Leydi Theodora'nın."
